text: Raul Renato Herrera Costa (born February 12, 1948), commonly known as Renato Costa or Renato Herrera, is a former Brazilian soccer player who played in the NASL. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="3"|Rochester Lancers |1970 |rowspan="2"|NASL |21||8||0||0||0||0||21||8 |- |1973 |2||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- ! colspan="2" |Total !23!!8!!0!!0!!0!!0!!23!!8 |- |Los Angeles Aztecs |1974 |rowspan="3"|NASL |16||3||0||0||0||0||16||3 |- |rowspan="2"|San Antonio Thunder |1975 |14||2||0||0||0||0||14||2 |- |1976 |0||0||0||0||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan="3" |Career total !53!!13!!0!!0!!0!!0!!53!!13 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Rochester Lancers (1967–1980) players Category:Los Angeles Aztecs players Category:San Antonio Thunder players Category:North American Soccer League (1968–1984) players Category:Expatriate soccer players in the United States Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in the United States Category:1948 births
